Text: RE Ft Lauderdale Boat ShowHi Mark Ill put the tickets in the mail today Joel will be happy to answer any and all of your questions when you see him on the boat He is at the Annapolis boat show now until We are looking forward to seeing you on the boat in Fort Lauderdale Best Regards Vela for Joel F Potter Cruising Yacht Specialist Amels Sole Associate for the Americas Original Message From Taylor Mark E Legal mailtoMark NRONcom Sent Tuesday October PM To Subject RE Ft Lauderdale Boat Show Thanks Vela My office address is fine Just so you know ahead of time what some of my questions will be Im a little concerned about the safety of inmast furling systems generally What happens if it jams in a blow Are the heads both electric Will they operate manually if you lose power The boat seems remarkably well equipped What sorts of additional items are usual to purchase before shes ready to cruise How do US owners deal with the voltage issues and electrical repairs and replacements Finally and I suppose of least importance Im not thrilled with the teaklook deck or the blue cabin sole Any hope of a manufacturing change Thanks again and Im looking forward to seeing you in Ft Lauderdale Mark Original Message From Joel F Potter ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJoelFEPotterCjfpottercysworld netEattEnetE NRONcom Sent Tuesday October PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE Ft Lauderdale Boat Show Dear Mark Thank you for your email We will be located at Pier dock C If you would like I can send you boat show tickets for Saturday and Sunday to your office address that you have listed Or if you prefer we can send them elsewhere Please let us know Best Regards Vela for Joel F Potter Cruising Yacht Specialist Amels Sole Associate for the Americas Original Message From Taylor Mark E Legal mailtoMark NRONcom Sent Friday September PM To Subject RE Ft Lauderdale Boat Show Joel Thanks for your note back Unfortunately I dont get into town until quite late on Friday evening so Saturday and Sunday are the only days I can make it Do you know yet where youll be located Mark Original Message From Joel F Potter ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJoelFEPotterCjfpottercysworld netEattEnetE NRONcom Sent Friday September PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE Ft Lauderdale Boat Show Dear Mark No appointment is needed but Trade Day Thursday is usually bestleast busy day to come aboard Shall I send you some tickets for that day If you would like them please send me your mailing address Best Regards Joel F Potter Cruising Yacht Specialist Amels Sole Associate for the Americas Original Message From Taylor Mark E Legal mailtoMark NRONcom Sent Friday September PM To Cc Subject Ft Lauderdale Boat Show I understand that you will have an Amel at the Ft Lauderdale boat show next month Do I need an appointment to see the boat Mark Taylor Vice President and General Counsel Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EB Houston Texas fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
